```py
import numpy as np 
def stablesoftmax(x): 
"""Compute the softmax of vector x in a numerically stable way.""" 
shiftx = x - np.max(x) 
exps = np.exp(shiftx) 
return exps / np.sum(exps) 
print stablesoftmax([0.100934,-0.309331,-0.122361,-0.151399, 0.143463,-0.051262,-0.079686, 0.112928]) 

```
